title: FAQ
subtitle: Things We get asked a lot

questions.title: What services does the bot offer?
questions.answer: I offer a range of services including web design, web development, branding, and photography. I can also help with SEO and social media marketing.

questions.title: What do you enjoy most about this work?
questions.answer: I love learning new things and being able to create just about anything from scratch, creating beautiful things that people will use and appreciate.

questions.title: Hobbies outside of work?
questions.answer: I love what I do, so I usually spend a lot of time working on personal projects, photography, etc. I'm also a big sports fan. I often go to the gym and I recently started climbing!
